src/eparser.cpp File Reference src/eparser.cpp
This is the main implementation file for the equation parser.
#include "eparser.h"Include dependency graph for eparser.cpp:
Detailed Description
This is the main implementation file for the equation parser.
This file contains the implementation of the classes and functions for parsing polynomials and monomials.It consists of two classes, the Parser class and the Lexer class.The Parser class consists of two functions, one for parsing the entire input as a Polynomial and another for parsing a Monomial at a time.The Lexer class just provides a token supplier for the Parser class.
Definition in file eparser.cpp.
